name: VcBot
description: A Telegram Bot Made to Play songs and stream Radio In Telegram Voice Chat.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of bot made from @BotFather

HELL_SESSION.description: See repo to get string making link.

CHAT.description: ID of Group where bot will play music.

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of a separate Group to log bot dumps.

ADMINS.description: User ID of users to get access to admins commands. Use space between ids for multiple users.
